trans-unit.source: OVD
LDAP Entry Access
Compare Data Item Attributes
Add Service
Add
Delete
Modify
Rename
Compare
Service Operation
This set of events creates and works with LDAP entries.
An end user or administrator logs in to OVD server. This is generated by ldapbind operation.
An end user or administrator logs out(unbind operation) from OVD server.
Permissions granted/denied to user for performing an operation against the OVD server.
Query (ldapsearch operation) sensitive information: userpassword.
Modify (ldapmodify operation) sensitive information: userpassword
Delete an OVD service such as adapter or listener.
Modify or change the configuration of an OVD service such as adapter or ACLs.
Compare (ldapcompare operation) sensitive information: userpassword
Add or Deploy an OVD service such as adapter or mapping.
Create an LDAP object through ldapadd operation.
Delete an LDAP object through ldapdelete operation.
Modify an LDAP object through ldapmodify operation.
Change the DN of an LDAP object through ldapmoddn operation.
Compare attribute value of an LDAP Entry through ldapcompare operation.
Name of the operation performed that changes the service configuration
